Train Wreck was silent as the disks exploded on his shoulder, causing a big=
 black patch...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 06, 2001 10:26 PM
  Subject: Clash 
=


  --- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

  Lynxiz reaches the base of the mountain=
, and transforms, drawing 
  her disk launcher. She aims, and fires three i=
mpact explosive disks 
  at the largest target there, Train Wreck. She grow=
ls to herself, 
  "You ain't gettin away easy this time." She prepares for =
another 
  round of fire.

  Axis, who is standing around with Lokk and See=
kker, is suprised 
  when weaponfire starts streaking around him. "Whoa, th=
at was 
  close!" He turns around, and spots some bots he knows: Train 
  W=
reck, McGowan and her group, and Demos. He watches the 
  fighting until Lo=
kk smacks him, "Axis, wake up, we've gotta defend 
  the base." Lokk draws =
his twin chain guns, and starts running 
  towards McGowan, firing continuo=
usly. Shells litter the ground, 
  behind him.

  Startled, Axis draws his =
charging laser, and his missile launcher. 
  He looks around, unsure of whi=
ch enemy bot to attack. He yells to 
  Lokk, "Lokk, which one should I atta=
ck?" Exasperated, Lokk calls 
  back, " Just chose one!" So Axis looks arou=
nd again, and spots 
  Barrymore. He follows Lokk firing two missiles at Ba=
rrymore, and 
  powering up his large laser.


  On 6 Jul 2001, at 20:53, R=
udra656@... wrote:

  > OOC: The posts confused me so I'm not sure wher=
e the battle is.  If it

  >     He looks around and spots the incoming train=

ots at Train Wreck.
